attributes.action: Remove restrictions for those who refuse to have any Covid-19 vaccines
attributes.additional_details: This county is about freedom or speech and the right of choice. This should be a decision one can solely make and not be bullied into having
attributes.background: I want the Government to prevent any restrictions being placed on those who refuse to have any potential Covid-19 vaccine. This includes restrictions on student nurses, jobs, travel, social events, such as concerts or sports. No restrictions whatsoever. This is discrimination.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open which you might like to sign:

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
